feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing a required update to a specific element in frontend/src/App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, CSS, Tailwind config, assets, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and including SEO‑optimized title and description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app containing hero slider, services, trust points, brand logos, gallery, map embed, and integrated components.
frontend/src/components/BusinessHighligh: Responsive highlight strip showing location, hours, call, and WhatsApp links with icons.
frontend/src/components/MobileCareSmartU: Section listing 25 smartphone care facts with a show more/less toggle.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppQuickMes: Popover button offering three quick WhatsApp message links using wa.me URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode variants, and utility classes including background texture and section-alt styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended theming, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the Gadget Zone website build.
